A question for you wonderful #writers. Have you ever attempted to compose a drunk poem? #poetry #haveyouever #questiontime #amwriting
I wish upon a fallen star, a silent whisper, an unspoken hope. My voice drifts upon a sea of many, lost in the cries of all who saw it pass.
The night is full of terrors. Beasts and demons, that tear apart the seams of this reality and break apart the sleeping sky. #poetry #story
"The stillness calls to all who listen. Ears cast with dreams of hope and hearts crying out to be made whole..." #amwriting #poetry

'When a mouse runs over your toes on the toilet, you defy reason and gravity in a single leap...' #truestory #Mouse #attacked #fear
'London would be rebuilt, but not by man. The kin of the other would lay the first stone and the world would tremble in its wake..' #story
'...Yet the living watched on with sly smiles upon their blood stained faces. The battle had been won, and the city was gone.' #amwriting
'The bell tower sunk beneath the black river and the dead screamed for vengeance...' #amwriting #storytelling #creative #writing
'The city burned for 14 days and nights. When the ash settled, a blanket of death covered the streets of London...' #amwriting #creative
'As they fell beneath her, withering in a mass of twisted limbs, they saw her for what she was. An angel of death...' #amwriting #creative
'They saw it to late. Blinded by blood lust they failed to notice the truth. Now the beasts became the hunted...' #amwriting #storytelling
'They raced towards her. Bodies of rage and blood. She waited. And as they neared unleashed her fury...' #amwriting #storytelling #creative
'She wondered if they saw the monster that lived within her heart. Did they not realise death stood before them?..' #amwriting #storytelling
'She saw the beasts approaching and couldn't help but see herself in them...' #amwriting #storytelling #Storytime #creative #writing
